1.title: Dell Studio XPS 16
1.details: Blending power with elegance, the Dell Studio XPS™ 16 delivers the ultimate multimedia laptop experience, providing superb performance and design

2.title: Alienware-x51
2.details: 3rd Generation Intel® Core™ i7-3770 Processor (3.4GHz, 8MB Cache, with Turbo Boost Technology 2.0)

3.title: PowerShot G1 X
3.details: Photographic excellence has arrived with the PowerShot G1 X, the most premium Canon compact camera that boasts of the largest sensor at 1.5”.

4.title: Iphone-3gs
4.details: iPhone 3GS embodies Apple’s continuing environmental progress.

5.title: MacBook Pro with Retina Display
5.details: Retina display 15.4-inch (diagonal) LED-backlit display with IPS technology; 2880-by-1800 resolution at 220 pixels per inch with support for millions of colors Supported resolutions: 2880 by 1800 pixels (Retina); scaled resolutions: 1920 by 1200, 1680 by 1050, 1280 by 800, and 1024 by 640 pixels
